examples: Those responsible for this crime will be severely punished.
Los responsables de este crimen serán severamente castigados.
My parents used to punish me by not letting me watch TV.
Mis padres solían castigarme al no dejarme ver televisión.
to punish a criminal/an offender/a perpetrator
castigar a un delincuente / un delincuente / un perpetrador
She will be punished for her crimes.
